summary: Pretty much first proper attempt at recolouring the Nightingale Armour... Now with both MALE and FEMALE!
descriptionHtml:
Pretty much first proper attempt at recolouring the Nightingale Armour...  Now with both MALE and FEMALE!

Matching Daedric Bow: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34771/

Since I use a bow a lot I thought of a Ranger themed look.. I went for a green arrow colour scheme. I retextured Dragonscale to look like nightingale originally however there is a little glitch on the helmet as skin shows through on parts despite meshing should be fine.. 

Would like ideas how to fix this issue as I can\'t stand the look of dragon armour and having over 2k armour rating.. I do like :D

Just extract the files in the obvious place :D enjoy

Dragonscale to Nightingale mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34782 works well with this mod :D
author: Reudaisu
